message:
DjangoPackages.com is a list of reusable apps/components/projects for the web framework Django. It allows you to compare some packages around a certain topic (as you see in the link).
Are there similar things for other systems (NodeJS, .net, etc)? Please share if you know
name: Django Packages : CMS
caption: www.djangopackages.com
description: This page lists a few well-known reusable Content Management System applications for Django and tries to gather a comparison of essential features in those applications.

data.message:
To compare? No, I haven't seen something like that.
For listing packages, there are plenty of those. npm for NodeJS, NuGet for .NET, etc.

> Want an OpenComparison site for your open-source community?
> Request one by tweeting at @open_comparison, and we'll see what we can do to help you, either now or in the future.

http://opencomparison.org/about.html

We can start a site for .net. This will give visibility to our group
